name: AppOrbit
description: A full-featured product review platform with authentication, voting, and analytics.
challenges: Designing a clean, responsive dashboard UI with real-time analytics (Recharts). Implementing role-based access for group admins and general users. Handling dynamic filtering, sorting, and search logic.
futurePlans: Add in-app messaging between group members. Enable event creation with calendar reminders and RSVP. Improve mobile experience with bottom navigation.

name: Friends Forever
description: A social platform to manage and share friend profiles with image uploads and real-time updates.
challenges: Managing secure image uploads and real-time synchronization across users.
futurePlans: Add friend recommendations, chat feature, and profile analytics.

name: Volunteer Management
description: An app to manage volunteer opportunities with user authentication and event tracking.
challenges: Ensuring accurate tracking of volunteer hours and notifications.
futurePlans: Add calendar integration, volunteer rating system, and automated email reminders.
